participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, loves outdoor activities and enjoys trying new things.
participant_1.background: i'm a huge coffee lover. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves art and is excited about family life.
participant_2.background: i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i'm pregnant with my first child.

content.text: i like coffee , but i like coffee too
I like drinking tea while reading some books
i like red , reminds me of summer time , which is why i hate it .
So you like it or hate it?
i like mountain climbing , but i also like to bike .
Where do you live? Close to mountains?
i like to draw , and draw , and draw , and draw , and draw , and paint , and draw , and draw , and paint .
i like to draw , but i also like to draw , and draw , and draw , and paint , and draw , and paint .
i like mountain climbing , but i also like to bike .
